word_mean: 成带现象：补体在数量较小的待检血清中发生的较强的结合现象

sentence.Network_en: Local zoning laws prohibit building near property lines.
sentence.Network_cn: 本地的规划法禁止在地产边界附近进行建筑施工。

sentence.Network_en: He had covered a breakfast meeting of the Country planning and zoning Board.
sentence.Network_cn: 他采访了县规划和区域划分委员会的早餐会议.

sentence.Network_en: He will be concerned also with the zoning and layouts of factories and municipal housing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将经营工厂和公用住宅群的分区规划和布局.

区划(Zoning)是美国土地使用控制的基本手段。它不仅控制土地使用，而且还控制开发的物质形态。

entry.tran: （有某些特色或特点的）地区，地带，区域
entry.def: A zone  is an area that has particular features or characteristics.

example.ex: Many people have stayed behind in the potential war zone...
example.tran: 许多人留在了可能会沦为交战区的地方。

example.ex: The area has been declared a disaster zone.
example.tran: 这个地区已经被宣布为灾难地带。

entry.tran: 将…划为特殊区域;指定…为某项用途区域
entry.def: If an area of land is zoned, it is formally set aside for a particular purpose.

example.ex: The land was not zoned for commercial purposes...
example.tran: 这块地未划作商业用地。

example.ex: Most of the private land in the park wasn't zoned or protected in any way.
example.tran: 公园中的大多数私人土地并未进行任何专门规划或保护。

means.word_mean: 1. dividing an area into zones or sections reserved for different purposes such as residence and business and manufacturing etc
